dt: {bc}the quality or state of being {d_link|distant|distant}: such as

dt.t: quite a {wi}distance{/wi} between the two hospitals
feels a {wi}distance{/wi} from her brother that wasn't there before

dt: {bc}an extent of area or an advance {dx_def}see {dxt|advance:2||1}{/dx_def} along a route measured in a straight line

dt.t: measure the {wi}distance{/wi} between point A and point B
the {wi}distance{/wi} between the Earth and the Sun

dt: {bc}an extent of space measured other than linearly

dt.t: won both the 400 meter and the 800 meter {wi}distances{/wi}

dt: {bc}the full length (as of a prizefight or ball game)
{bc}an extent of advance from a beginning

dt.t: they carried Puritan severity quite a {wi}distance{/wi}
A {wi}distance{/wi} of field, woods, and diluted November sky …

dt: {bc}the degree or amount of separation between two points, lines, surfaces, or objects

shortdef: the quality or state of being distant: such as
personal and especially emotional separation; also : reserve, coldness

dt: {bc}to make or maintain a personal or emotional separation from {bc}to place or keep at a distance

dt.t: able to {wi}distance{/wi} themselves from the tragedy
easily {it}distanced{/it} the other candidates in the race

shortdef: to make or maintain a personal or emotional separation from : to place or keep at a distance

dt: {bc}the frame of reference that an artist creates by the use of technical devices in and around the work of art to differentiate it psychologically from reality

shortdef: the frame of reference that an artist creates by the use of technical devices in and around the work of art to differentiate it psychologically from reality

dt: {bc}the nearest distance upon which a photographic lens may be focused to produce satisfactory definition at infinity

shortdef: the nearest distance upon which a photographic lens may be focused to produce satisfactory definition at infinity

dt: {bc}a telephone operator or exchange that gives long-distance connections

shortdef: a telephone operator or exchange that gives long-distance connections

dt: {bc}the arithmetical mean of the maximum and minimum distances of an orbiting celestial object from its primary

shortdef: the arithmetical mean of the maximum and minimum distances of an orbiting celestial object from its primary

dt: {bc}a part of a pictorial representation or scene between the foreground and the background
{bc}any footrace distance usually from 800 to 1500 meters or from 880 yards to one mile

shortdef: a part of a pictorial representation or scene between the foreground and the background
any footrace distance usually from 800 to 1500 meters or from 880 yards to one mile

dt: {bc}a greater than usual physical separation between people during the outbreak of a contagious disease in order to minimize exposure and reduce the transmission of infection

dt.t: Health professionals are urging the public to … stay home when sick and keep a {wi}physical distance{/wi} between oneself and others to reduce the risk of being exposed to the virus.

The models don't reveal how long Canadians will have to maintain {wi}physical distance{/wi}, but they do indicate the measures will need to be in place "for a considerable amount of time," [Dr. Theresa] Tam said.

shortdef: a greater than usual physical separation between people during the outbreak of a contagious disease in order to minimize exposure and reduce the transmission of infection

dt: {bc}to cause (oneself) to maintain physical separation (such as 6 feet) from other people or avoid any unnecessary contact with others during the outbreak of a contagious disease in order to minimize exposure and reduce the transmission of infection {bc}{sx|socially distance||}

dt.t: With efforts to {wi}physically distance{/wi} ourselves due to COVID-19, people may be willing to do phone calls or video chats in lieu of face-to-face informational interviews.

shortdef: to cause (oneself) to maintain physical separation (such as 6 feet) from other people or avoid any unnecessary contact with others during the outbreak of a contagious disease in order to minimize exposure and reduce the transmission of infection : socially distance

dt.t: lived within {it}shouting distance{/it} of her cousins

shortdef: a short distance : easy reach —usually used with within
